name: Running Pikhoofd: Unity Stylized Forest Run Game
name_original: Running Pikhoofd: Unity Stylized Forest Run Game
description:
Try to get the highest high score and earn all the collectibles in the shop in this endless runner 3D game made in Unity!

You control a zombie who is very good at running but is very quick to die, try to avoid all the obstacles as long as possible, and claim the title of: "BEST RUNNING ZOMBIE OF THE WORLD"!

While you are running in this stylized 3D forest environment, you will come across 'brains' which you can pick up and spend in the shop of the game!

At the moment you can only buy different head accessories but if the game goes well I will add different characters with even more accessories!

So if you do like the game it would mean a lot to me if you would leave a review and share your thoughts about it to support me.

Keep in mind that this is my first game to release on the google play store and more will come! Because at the moment of release I'm a student following a course around Indie Game Development so I'm constantly trying to learn and improve my skills.

Hope you will like it and have a nice day!
